mapper.select: SELECT R.SEQ, R.NAME, R.BIRTH, R.GENDER, R.PHONE, R.EMAIL, R.ADDR, R.LOCATION, R.WORK_TYPE, R.SUBMIT, E.EDU_SEQ, E.SCHOOL_NAME, E.DIVISION, E.START_PERIOD, E.END_PERIOD, E.MAJOR, E.GRADE, E.LOCATION AS EDU_LOCATION, C.CAR_SEQ, C.COMP_NAME, C.LOCATION AS CAR_LOCATION, C.START_PERIOD AS CAR_START_PERIOD, C.END_PERIOD AS CAR_END_PERIOD, C.TASK, C.SALARY, CE.CERT_SEQ, CE.QUALIFI_NAME, CE.ACQU_DATE, CE.ORGANIZE_NAME FROM RECRUIT R LEFT JOIN EDUCATION E ON R.SEQ = E.SEQ LEFT JOIN CAREER C ON R.SEQ = C.SEQ LEFT JOIN CERTIFICATE CE ON R.SEQ = CE.SEQ WHERE R.SEQ = ( SELECT COALESCE( (SELECT SEQ FROM RECRUIT WHERE NAME = #{name} AND PHONE = #{phone}), '' ) FROM DUAL )
